name: 亚历克西斯·史密斯 Alexis Smith
intro: Margaret Alexis Smith (June 8, 1921 – June 9, 1993) was a Canadian-born stage, film, and television actress and singer. She appeared in several major Hollywood films in the 1940s and had a notable career on Broadway in the 1970s, winning a Tony Award in 1972.
birthplace: 加拿大,不列颠哥伦比亚省,彭蒂克顿
